title: Inhibition of sugar-binding activity of Galectins-8 by thiogalactoside (TDG) attenuates secondary brain damage and improves long-term prognosis following intracerebral hemorrhage
content:
Publication date: 15 May 2024

Source: Heliyon, Volume 10, Issue 9
